data.title: My NES games
data.text:
NES GAME COLLECTION

BACK TO CINEMASSACRE.COM

BLUE = I OWN IT

BLACK = I DON'T OWN IT

ORANGE = MINOR DAMAGE, REPLACE ONLY IF CHEAP

RED = MAJOR DAMAGE, NEED REPLACEMENT
